{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Motorola |model=MR2600 |revision=v1 |series=AC2600 |asin=B07CDQNHRX |newegg=N82E16833301068 |price=120 |fcc_date=01/10/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SGE (T&W) |manuf_model=AP-MTKH7 |manuf_rev=-0002 |type=wireless router |fcc_id=2AF5PMR2600 |pcb_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT;MEDIATEK, MT7621AT, 1717-AMTH, CTP??Y60, DTPCWU44; |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12805D |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC64M16GP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7615N;MEDIATEK, ARM, MT7615N, 1716-BFSL, ACMS1F72; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7615N;MEDIATEK, ARM, MT7615N, 1716-BFSL, ACMS1F72; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz RF Front End Module;Qorvo (RFMD);RFFM4552;Q, 4552, VB8P;4; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=MOTOXXXX, |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=motorola }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''800''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC2600 WiFi Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://motorolanetwork.com/mr2600.html}} {{SupportPage|vendor=motorolacable|model=MR2600}} "AP-MTKH7-0002 REV1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{See also|SGE AP-MTKH7|SGE|T&W}} ===See also=== This may suggest that the device is designed by [[SGE]] ([[T&W]]), see also: *[[D-Link DIR-882 rev A1]] *[[D-Link DIR-878 rev A1]] *[[D-Link DIR-867 rev A1]] ===See also=== *[[Motorola MX1200]] *[[Motorola MR1700]] • AP-MTKH7-0003 *[[Motorola MR1900]] *[[Motorola MR2600]] • AP-MTKH7-0002 __NOTOC__
